DOC.brief_summary: The goal of the study is to understand the meaning of progression-free survival for women with metastatic breast cancer and to use this understanding to create and distribute a new questionnaire to assess the effect progression has on a woman's functioning and well-being.
DOC.brief_title: Patient-reported Outcome Questionnaire for Women With Metastatic Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: This study is being conducted in three stages. Stages I and II are complete. Participation in Stage III requires the completion of an online survey. The survey may be accessed at the following link: https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/mbc3survey Compensation options for eligible participants are listed at the end of the survey. Eligibility will be confirmed in follow-up call/email by study staff.
DOC.criteria: Female Age 18 and older Clinical diagnosis of metastatic breast cancer U.S. resident Able to speak and read English Willing to sign and informed consent Willing to selfadminister one online questionnaire that will take approximately 15 minutes to complete
